test.name: Deve acessar todos os APKs da pasta

kw.name: Dado que os APKs estão disponíveis na pasta
List Files In Directory
kw.msg: 7 files: app-abapen-release.apk app-cbpa-release.apk app-jogosdosfamosos-release.apk app-keeper-release.apk app-loopiclub-release.apk app-loopilucaneta-release.apk app-unaspub-release.apk
kw.doc: Wrapper for `List Directory` that returns only files.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Então abrir e fechar cada APK
Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.1/cli/args/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Text
kw.doc: Click text identified by ``text``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.
